hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -q '\.py$'; then source /home/dzack/dotfiles/bin/llm-repl-project/.venv/bin/activate && ruff check --fix $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS && black $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -E '\.t?css$'; then if command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1; then prettier --write $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS; fi && if command -v stylelint >/dev/null 2>&1; then stylelint --fix $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -q '\.py$'; then cd /home/dzack/dotfiles/bin/llm-repl-project/V3-minimal && source ../venv/bin/activate && python -m py_compile $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>&1 || echo "⚠️  Python syntax error in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -E '\.(ya?ml|json)$'; then if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep '\.json$'; then python -m json.tool $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo "❌ Invalid JSON in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; elif echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep '\.ya?ml$'; then python -c "import yaml; yaml.safe_load(open('$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS'))" 2>&1 || echo "❌ Invalid YAML in $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; fi; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep '\.py$' && git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then git add $CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -E '(requirements.*\.txt|pyproject\.toml|pdm\.lock|package\.json)$'; then echo "📦 Dependencies file updated - remember to install/sync!"; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -E '^(sudo|rm -rf|:(){ :|:& };:)'; then echo '{"decision": "block", "reason": "Potentially dangerous command detected. Please use caution."}'; fi
